des: "A zingy angel hair pasta salad recipe with Italian dressing and tomatoes. It's quick to prepare and most ingredients should already be in your pantry or refrigerator."
ins: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Add pasta and cook for 4 to 5 minutes or until al dente; drain and place into a large serving bowl.  Toss with dressing and tomatoes.  Top with Parmesan and serve.
